pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce CommandKit as a Discord.js meta-framework, explaining its purpose, key features, and overall architecture at a high level

pages.title: Monorepo Structure
pages.purpose: Document the monorepo organization, workspace packages, shared configurations, and how the packages relate to each other

pages.title: Package Ecosystem
pages.purpose: Catalog all packages in the monorepo (core, plugins, apps) with brief descriptions and their relationships

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through creating their first CommandKit bot, from scaffolding to running their first commands

pages.title: Installation and Project Setup
pages.purpose: Explain how to use create-commandkit to scaffold a new project, including template options and configuration

pages.title: Configuration System
pages.purpose: Document commandkit.config.ts structure, available options, and how to configure the framework

pages.title: Core Framework
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the CommandKit class, initialization lifecycle, and fundamental architecture

pages.title: Command System
pages.purpose: Explain how commands work, including command types (slash, message, context menu), file structure, and registration

pages.title: Chat Input Commands (Slash Commands)
pages.purpose: Detail slash command implementation, options, autocomplete, and Discord API integration

pages.title: Message Commands
pages.purpose: Document prefix-based message commands, argument parsing, and prefix resolution system

pages.title: Context Menu Commands
pages.purpose: Explain user and message context menu commands, their registration and execution

pages.title: Command Metadata
pages.purpose: Document metadata system for permissions, guilds, aliases, and command customization

pages.title: Event System
pages.purpose: Explain Discord.js event handling, event file structure, parallel/sequential execution, and custom events

pages.title: Context and Execution
pages.purpose: Document the Context object, execution modes, environment management, and AsyncLocalStorage usage

pages.title: Context API
pages.purpose: Detail all Context properties and methods, type guards, and context cloning

pages.title: Environment and AsyncLocalStorage
pages.purpose: Explain CommandKitEnvironment, how context propagates across async operations, and deferred functions

pages.title: Middleware System
pages.purpose: Document middleware types (global, directory, command), execution order, and control signals

pages.title: Command Registration
pages.purpose: Explain how commands are registered with Discord's API, global vs guild commands, and update strategies

pages.title: Plugin System
pages.purpose: Introduce the plugin architecture, RuntimePlugin vs CompilerPlugin, lifecycle hooks, and plugin development

pages.title: Plugin Lifecycle and Hooks
pages.purpose: Document all plugin lifecycle hooks (bootstrap, loading, registration, runtime) and when they execute

pages.title: Creating Plugins
pages.purpose: Guide for developing custom RuntimePlugins and CompilerPlugins with examples

pages.title: Official Plugins
pages.purpose: Overview of all official @commandkit/* plugins and their purposes

pages.title: AI Plugin (@commandkit/ai)
pages.purpose: Document AI command execution, command-to-tool transformation, AI context, and model integration

pages.title: AI Configuration and Models
pages.purpose: Explain configureAI options, model selection, prompt preparation, and message filtering

pages.title: Commands as AI Tools
pages.purpose: Detail how to expose commands as AI-executable tools, aiConfig, and parameter extraction

pages.title: AI Context and Built-in Tools
pages.purpose: Document AiContext, useAIContext hook, and default tools like createEmbed and getChannelById

pages.title: i18n Plugin (@commandkit/i18n)
pages.purpose: Document internationalization plugin, locale file structure, command translation, and runtime usage

pages.title: i18n Setup and Configuration
pages.purpose: Explain i18n plugin initialization, i18next configuration, and locale directory structure

pages.title: Command Localization
pages.purpose: Detail translation metadata keys, command name/description localization, and Discord API integration

pages.title: Runtime Translation
pages.purpose: Document ctx.locale(), fetchT(), and useI18n() hooks for accessing translations in commands and events
